SELECT
FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE yyyyMMdd =(SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1) AND cell_code=#{cellname} limit 1

SELECT
FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND cell_code=#{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd

SELECT
FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') > DATE_SUB((SELECT yyyyMMdd FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE cell_code = #{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd DESC LIMIT 1),INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND cell_code=#{cellname} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd

SELECT
FROM t_cell_result_history WHERE cell_code=#{cellname} and STR_TO_DATE(yyyyMMdd,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY yyyyMMdd
